attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
with being a forces wife we have to give up alot to support our husbands in there job all the other forces in the world there wives get paid so why cant we.

we have to give up our jobs to follow them around most of us cant work because childcare is to expensive and we dont get any help 

if germany and america can pay there forces wives why cant the uk .
